interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: X-TrainFit: Circuit Burnout 30 Day Fat Shred- 5-Disc set
Review Date: 2013/12/10
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness
Product Description: ['LOSE WEIGHT AT HOME WITH MONIQUE ST.PIERRE', 'Looking to scorch fat but have limited time each day? Then this is the set for you! Monique St.Pierre and X-TrainFit bring you a high energy and up-tempo full body workout that shreds fat while toning muscle in only 20 minutes a day.', 'The pyramid approach keeps you moving with cardio and toning sets while showing a variety of intensity levels. Work through multiple moves for 5 minutes, rest for 1 minute, sweat and tone for 4 minutes, rest for 1, shred it for 3 more minutes, rest for 1, push through 2 minutes, rest for 1 more then finish strong in the final 1 minute set!', '5 WORKOUTS ON 5 DVDS', 'Abs and Assets - Chisel your entire midsection and glutes with this killer workout.', 'Upper Body - Effective use of cardio moves and upper body toning will burn fat while toning everything from the belly button up.', 'Lower Body - Lunge, kick, squat and more to get the lower body you have been wanting.', 'Total Body - Monique will work every inch of your body in this intense workout.', 'Abs and Burn - This cardiovascular routine is a fast paced, no nonsense, full body fat burner.', 'SUPER SETS', 'If you think you can handle it or you are just a cardio-fanatic, well we have you covered. Each DVD includes a bonus Super Set designed to give you an added calorie burn at the end of each workout. Give us 5 more minutes and we will grant you bonus pounds shredded!', 'TRAINING AND NUTRITION GUIDE', 'The included guide guide will help maximize your workouts and fat loss by providing guidance and recipes designed to fuel your workouts and lose the fat. Combine this with the Training Calendar provided and your results are guaranteed!', 'Requires: Dumbbells or Resistance band and stability ball (not included)']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'DVD', 'Contributor': 'Monique St.Pierre', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '5', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.1 x 0.9 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'DVD', 'Actors': 'Monique St.Pierre', 'Studio': 'X-TrainFit', 'Number of discs': '5'}
Review Text: I love to switch up my workouts. This one is a great addition to my collection. It's challenging and moves at a quick pace. I'll definitely be buying more DVDs in this series.
Review Title: Great Workouts
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Jillian Michaels Ripped in 30
Jillian Michaels  (Actor),     Andrea Ambandos  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Exercise & Fitness
["Get RIPPED with America's Toughest Trainer! Jillian Michaels new DVD Ripped in 30 is a comprehensive 30-day diet and exercise plan designed to get you in the best shape of your life! Ripped in 30 is comprised of four 24-minute workouts based on Jillian's best-selling body shredding 3-2-1 interval system: 3 minutes of strength, 2 minutes of cardio and 1 minute of abs. Each incredible routine has fresh, fun new moves that progress in difficulty over a four-week period (a new workout each week). You'll start with workout level 1 and advance to workout level 4. Jillian also shows modified moves for both beginners and advanced athletes in each workout. All you have to do to get sick, insane, crazy, amazing results fast is stick with the Ripped in 30 diet and exercise program for 30 days. Get ready to get RIPPED!"]
{'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Jillian Michaels, Andrea Ambandos', 'Language': 'Unqualified (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 16 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 5.5 x 0.5 inches; 3.5 Ounces', 'Item model number': '05-58076', 'Director': 'Andrea Ambandos', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Run time': '2 hours and 16 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 9, 2012', 'Actors': 'Jillian Michaels', 'Studio': 'Gaiam - Fitness', 'Number of discs': '1'}
This DVD is not for the faint of heart. It is quite challenging and you'll be pouring sweat after just a few minutes. I've made it through all four levels, though I've only done level 4 once. I'd say that level 1 done with 8lb handweights is the best overall workout on the DVD. If you're looking for an intense 30-min workout that hits all the right places, this is the one for you.
Best Jillian workout yet!!!

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Fitness Enthusiast**: The user maintains a strong preference for intense exercise programs, focusing on both strength and cardio integration. 
- **Challenge-Seeker**: They appreciate demanding workouts that yield significant results, demonstrating a willingness to engage in tough training sessions.
- **Structured Programs**: The user favors comprehensive fitness plans that guide them through progressive levels, indicating a preference for structured and systematic approaches to exercise.
- **Diverse Workout Formats**: They enjoy varying their routines, with recent interactions showing an openness to integrating DVD workouts into their fitness regimen. 
- **Positive Reviews**: Their high ratings reflect satisfaction with effective programs, suggesting they favor well-designed, results-oriented fitness offerings.
- **Equipment Use**: They incorporate resistance training into their routine, utilizing weights and additional equipment like resistance bands and stability balls, as indicated by their recent purchases.
- **Commitment to Routine**: The user exhibits determination and discipline by completing full workout programs, highlighting their commitment to fitness.
- **Preference for Quick Workouts**: They favor shorter, high-intensity workouts that can be completed efficiently, aligning with their busy lifestyle.

Overall, the user demonstrates a serious commitment to fitness through a preference for challenging, effective, and structured programs while being receptive to various workout formats to keep their routine dynamic and engaging.
